tasks.task: Design and operate a log-moving vehicle
subtasks: Introduce yourself and explain the purpose of the vehicle
Demonstrate the 5,000-pound winch and its wiring harness
Explain the use of grade 75 16th chain and chain keepers
Describe the walking beam suspension and its benefits
Show the trolley system for carrying logs and discuss cradle and chain usage
Demonstrate the machine's ability to traverse obstacles using walking beam suspension
Explain the safety features, including the swiveling tongue and grease joint
Demonstrate handling a log, including choker chain placement and operating the machine
Show the ease of positioning the machine and managing the log
Perform a demonstration of traversing over an obstacle with the machine
Provide contact information and encourage feedback
